name: obsidian-auto-card-link
description: Automatically fetches metadata from a url and makes it as a card-styled link

scripts.build: bun build src/main.ts --outfile=main.js --format=cjs --external=obsidian --external=electron --minify --banner="/* THIS IS A GENERATED/BUNDLED FILE BY BUN */"
scripts.version: bun version-bump.js && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Nekoshita Yuki
